body:
Comment 1: 
This is as expected.

Just as "go install foo" only reinstalls the dependencies in the workspace (GOPATH) in
which "foo" resides, "go run foo.go" for a file will only rebuild dependencies in the
workspace in which "foo.go" resides. If "foo.go" is not in a workspace, no dependencies
are rebuilt.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
